p: The six internal genes of A(H1N1)pdm09 from Myanmar and India were aligned by each segment using BioEdit software. The FASTA files of the multiple alignment of each segment were uploaded to the FluSurver ( https://flusurver.bii.a-star.edu.sg/) to find any amino acid mutations compared to the vaccine strain, A/Michigan/45/2015, a WHO-recommended A(H1N1)pdm09 strain for the Southern hemisphere in 2017 [ 22], and to search for mutations that have significant functional or pathological implications.
